data.name: Firestar
data.description: A mutant with Amazing Friends, Firestar generates scorching heat and flames using microwaves to pierce enemy defenses.

starItems.name: Firestar
starItems.description: A mutant with Amazing Friends, Firestar generates scorching heat and flames using microwaves to pierce enemy defenses.

1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to a random <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color>, Spider-Man, or Iceman ally that does not have <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to a random <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color>, Spider-Man, or Iceman ally that does not have <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary target
This attack has +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Extra Crit Chance

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to a random <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color>, Spider-Man, or Iceman ally that does not have <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

This attack has +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Extra Crit Chance.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary target
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to a random <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color>, Spider-Man, or Iceman ally that does not have <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

This attack has +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Extra Crit Chance.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary target
On Crit, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to a random <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color>, Spider-Man, or Iceman ally that does not have <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

On Crit, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

This attack has +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Extra Crit Chance.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary target
This attack has +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Extra Crit Chance

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to a random <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color>, Spider-Man, or Iceman ally that does not have <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

On Crit, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

This attack has +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

1.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

2.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>110%</color> Piercing.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to primary and adjacent targets

3.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to primary and adjacent targets

4.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect on primary and adjacent targets

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>220%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect on primary and adjacent targets.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>260%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect on primary and adjacent targets.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects to negative effects

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>320%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

Flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects to negative effects on primary and adjacent targets.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>3</color> additional times.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing to primary and adjacent targets

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>3</color> additional times.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing to primary and adjacent targets

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>3</color> additional times.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and adjacent targets
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>3</color> additional times.

This attack has +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Extra Crit Chance.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and adjacent targets
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Crit Chance

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>3</color> additional times.

This attack has +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Extra Crit Chance.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and adjacent targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to primary and adjacent targets

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> and <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>3</color> additional times.

This attack has +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Extra Crit Chance.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary and adjacent targets
On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> <color=#fff568>OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to primary and adjacent targets

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing, apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> and <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, and on <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> <color=#fff568>OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>3</color> additional times.

This attack has +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

1.description:
On any enemy turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack the enemy with the highest Speed, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing + lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

When an enemy attacks this character, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self, and all Iceman and Spider-Man allies.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing
On any enemy turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to the enemy with the highest Speed

2.description:
On any enemy turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack the enemy with the highest Speed, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> + lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

When an enemy attacks this character, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self, and all Iceman and Spider-Man allies.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing
On any enemy turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, flip <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> on the enemy with the highest Speed

3.description:
On any enemy turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack the enemy with the highest Speed, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, flip <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, and lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

When an enemy attacks this character, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self, and all Iceman and Spider-Man allies.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing
On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> <color=#fff568>OFFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Accuracy for self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies

4.description:
On any enemy turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack the enemy with the highest Speed, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, flip <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, and lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

When an enemy attacks this character, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self, and all Iceman and Spider-Man allies.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> <color=#fff568>OFFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Accuracy for self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>
On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> <color=#fff568>OFFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Accuracy for self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies

5.description:
On Spawn, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

On any enemy turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack the enemy with the highest Speed, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, flip <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, and lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

When an enemy attacks this character, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self, and all Iceman and Spider-Man allies.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> <color=#fff568>OFFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Accuracy for self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies.
